description: Teledatics’ HaloMax, recently featured on CrowdSupply, is a long-range wireless module designed for applications like smart agriculture, industrial control, and HAM radio. Operating in the sub-1 GHz band, it delivers reliable, power-efficient communication over extended distances with FCC-allowed maximum output power. The HaloMax product lineup offers a range of modules and accessories tailored for long-range […]
title: HaloMax Product Line for Long-Range, Low-Power Wireless Solutions
